name: As descendants of Kaguya Ōtsutsuki, as they have inherited a derivative of her original ability to manipulate one's bone structures through their kekkei genkai "[Shikotsumyaku

To compensate for the trauma this ability has on their body, the Kaguya Clan naturally can heal 1 tier of bleeding, if applicable, per round! This kekkei genkai is added to their jutsu bank as their ability to use this technique increases over time with usage.

name: Members of the Yamanaka clan are able to transfer their own minds into the body of another, assentially hijacking their targets body! This signature move is the "[Mind Transfer Technique
description: ttp://aminoapps.com/p/5i620k]", taught to all Yamanaka. Yamanaka have "Shintenjutsu" listed amongst their Jutsu Skills. Half bred from this clan and taught the basics, this user can only use jutsu of the Yamanaka clan with half of the effect. This individual may also cast this technique via direct eye contact through their Sharingan, when applicable.

name: The Ketsuryūgan is recognised by its reddish colour, giving a special appearance for the users of this dōjutsu, characterised as holders of "eyes as red as blood". Its power earned it comparison to the Three Great Dōjutsu, increasing the users "Genjutsu Score" by an amount equal to 50% of their "Ketsuryūgan score". The Ketsuryūgan confers genjutsu casting abilities either by making physical skin contact with the target or meeting each other's gaze. Upon which, they can hypnotise the victim in a variety of ways with their "[Genjutsu: Ketsuryūgan
description: ttp://aminoapps.com/p/65tor9]", or even delve deep into their minds to extract information. The Ketsuryūgan also gave the users the ability to manipulate iron, or more accurately, any liquid with a high iron concentration. As such, fitting with its moniker, the Ketsuryūgan can manipulate the blood within a living target, whether if be themselves or another being.

name: Unlike many other Dojutsu, the effects of these eyes activation course through out the users body, not so much increasing their vision, but seeing things differently and attuning them to their other heightening senses, gaining the "Canine Characteristics" ability and increasing their EP and OP by 40%. Another effect on their body is the slight growth, strengthening, and shaping if their teeth into Fangs , and their nails into (2)Claws , as well as increasing their Land Speed by 40% when running on all fours! However, the most dangerous aspect of this Dōjutsu is it's ability to manipulating others with their own will by a simple shared glance via the eye's technique, " [Commanding Stare
description: ttp://aminoapps.com/p/tptqtw] " which forces the commanded to obey short and simple instructions, such as "sit", "stay", "fetch", and other movements or half actions/reactions, against their will, exception of self harm as long as they are within the effective range and can hear the commands. As intriguing as these eyes seem, not all are worthy of being blessed by their possession, awakening this gift only once the Ōkami has recognized a true pack of at least 5 who are loyal deep down, and have been truly recognized in kind as their leader, also unlocking the "Ōkamiogan" skill. As long as this Dōjutsu is actived, it costs -5ChP per Minute per eye.

name: The second, final, and greatest stage of this Dōjutsu, the Kuraōkamiogan... These eyes are forbidden for any to posesses but one, they who are said to be divinely chosen, recognized by their clan's people as their one truest leader, awakened with an "Ōkamiogan" Score of 100 and 10 followers. Upon activation, the castor's hair bleaches to hues of grey or even white as an ancient dwelling power surfaces, their claws blacken and grow, (Fangs <Sharp×2, +30Dmg>), their teeth sharpen, ((2)Claws <Sharp×2, +15Dmg>). Their ascended senses in all ways grant them the "Sensory Type" trait and cause EP and OP increase by 80%, as does their land speed when running on all fours! These eyes may still cast "Commanding Stare", but now at a 50% greater effect, but more terrifying still is their " [Dominating Gaze
description: ttp://aminoapps.com/p/lekmbg] ", which binds the target's will to their own, preventing them from intentionally or knowingly disobeying or opposing the will of their master and their demands, barring harm to themself or the latter. Keeping this stage active drains -7ChP of the castor per eye per minute.

name: The�Rasengan�is a spinning ball of pure�chakra is�formed and held in the palm of the user's hand.The Rasengan was created based on observations made of the� [Tailed Beast Bomb
description: ttp://aminoapps.com/p/dknqh4r] [|], intended to be the highest form of�shape transformation. The Rasengan does not require�hand seals�to perform. Once it is formed, it also does not require any additional chakra to sustain it, which means that there is no definite limit to how long the Rasengan can be maintained, however, more chakra may be pumped into it to increase it's size and power. However, the Rasengan will dissipate if it collides with something, even if it's an unintended target. On contact, the Rasengan grinds into its target, propels them along the Rasengan's trajectory - either away from the user or into the ground beneath them - and at some point bursts, causing severe damage at the point of contact. Though not as masterful as it's shape transformation, givin it's elementless nature, one may add properties of an elemenral nature into this technique via [|] [Chakra Flow|http://aminoapps.com/p/6ce2ro] [|].

Chakra Control 200, Sage Mode, [Tree Climbing Jutsu

Through the "Eye of Hypnotism", when casting Genjutsu via Sharingan with a Single Tomoe, or having genjutsu cast visually to the host through their sharingan, one uses their Sharingan score as the "Grappling Strength" +10% of there Genjutsu score. They also use their "Sharingan" and "Genjutsu" score to determine the increase in Genjutsu effects cast in this way. Upon gaining the first Tomoe, one is able to perform a special technique, known only as " [Genjutsu: Sharingan
description: ttp://aminoapps.com/p/ilz71v] ", via direct eye contact, requiring a C-Rank Jutsu Bank slot to possess, understand and use. At this stage, if the target has a 50% lower Genjutsu grappling score, you can implant suggestions in your targets mind to think or move in minor ways, effecting half their actions or reactions, making 5 word statemens or believing 5 word thoughts, increasing by +5 words per sharingan stage, while leaving them to think the thoughts were there own. Casting Genjutsu: Sharingan also lowers the target's EP, OP, and ROP by 10%, increasing by 10% per Sharingan stage!

name: A Mangekyō Sharingan is distinguished from a normal Sharingan by its appearance, which changes the form of the tomoe seal. While the exact design differs for each user, though all resemble pinwheels. This may only be awakened once the three tomoe have been granted, and the user must be, or truly feel, the trauma of being responsible for a truly loved one or closest friend or family. Just being activated drains -8ChP/Minute per eye activated, but each eye also gains S-Rank abilities unique to the user with their own costs, and when used together, form the great, "[Susanoo
description: ttp://aminoapps.com/p/pkb5i5g]". Over time and repeated use, the dōjutsu cast by the Mangekyō's eyes may lead to their eye's permanent loss of vision. The castor may use their Mangekyō dōjutsu an amount of times equivalent to 10+(10% (1/10th) of their "Sharingan" score), (rounded down). Using the Susanoo adds 1 use for each eye. In practice, this means the eye of one with a "Sharingan" score of 100 will become "Blind" on it's 10th use of it's power.
